trans-unit.resname: You can just leave this option empty if you do not know what it means.
trans-unit.source: You can just leave this option empty if you do not know what it means.
trans-unit.target: You can just leave this option empty if you do not know what it means.

trans-unit.resname: Setting a value would make these changes:
trans-unit.source: Setting a value would make these changes:
trans-unit.target: Setting a value would make these changes:

trans-unit.resname: 1. Images you uploaded would be used as background images.
trans-unit.source: 1. Images you uploaded would be used as background images.
trans-unit.target: 1. Images you uploaded would be used as background images.

trans-unit.resname: 2. The height of this slider would not decrease on samll screen devices. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.
trans-unit.source: 2. The height of this slider would not decrease on samll screen devices. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 2. The height of this slider would not decrease on samll screen devices. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.

trans-unit.resname: 3. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.
trans-unit.source: 3. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 3. Images will be kind like cropped on small screen devices, some parts of your images may not be visible.

trans-unit.resname: 4. This module would work exactly like the "Iosslider" module which has been removed.
trans-unit.source: 4. This module would work exactly like the "Iosslider" module which has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 4. This module would work exactly like the "Iosslider" module which has been removed.

trans-unit.resname: 5. "Transition style" setting below would not take work for this slider.
trans-unit.source: 5. "Transition style" setting below would not take work for this slider.
trans-unit.target: 5. "Transition style" setting below would not take work for this slider.

trans-unit.resname: 1. This slider will work in a different way comparing with other slider modules, there must be someone like the way.
trans-unit.source: 1. This slider will work in a different way comparing with other slider modules, there must be someone like the way.
trans-unit.target: 1. This slider will work in a different way comparing with other slider modules, there must be someone like the way.

trans-unit.resname: 2. You do not have to pay much attention to the dimensions of images.
trans-unit.source: 2. You do not have to pay much attention to the dimensions of images.
trans-unit.target: 2. You do not have to pay much attention to the dimensions of images.

trans-unit.resname: The banner column would take the rest.
trans-unit.source: The banner column would take the rest.
trans-unit.target: The banner column would take the rest.

trans-unit.resname: Auto option allows you to upload images in different wide. An example is on demo .
trans-unit.source: Auto option allows you to upload images in different wide. An example is on demo .
trans-unit.target: Auto option allows you to upload images in different wide. An example is on demo .

trans-unit.resname: If true, then active slide will be centered, not always on the left side.
trans-unit.source: If true, then active slide will be centered, not always on the left side.
trans-unit.target: If true, then active slide will be centered, not always on the left side.

trans-unit.resname: If this field is filled in, whole image will become clickable. But if there are any links or buttons in the Caption field, this setting will be ignored.
trans-unit.source: If this field is filled in, whole image will become clickable. But if there are any links or buttons in the Caption field, this setting will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: If this field is filled in, whole image will become clickable. But if there are any links or buttons in the Caption field, this setting will be ignored.

trans-unit.resname: In most case, content from the advanced editor are in white color, so you can not see them. Clicking on the Source Code btton to see them.
